entries.message: Our network engineers and upstream providers have stabilized the Silicon Valley network at the moment. Network connectivity in the region has returned, however our network engineers and upstream providers are still working together to ensure a permanent fix is being put into place to prevent further outages.
We are currently experiencing a partial outage in our Silicon Valley location. Our network engineers are actively working with our upstream providers to restore connectivity as quickly as possible.

Event Type: Network Upgrade

We are performing system changes in the New Jersey location during the following scheduled maintenance window. 

Start Time: 2021-07-13 07:00:00 UTC
End Time: 2021-07-13 11:00:00 UTC

We schedule higher impact maintenance events during off-peak times to maintain our ideal hosting environment. Our engineers make every effort to minimize system impact; however, New Jersey instances may be unreachable for some, or all, of the scheduled maintenance window as we perform network, firmware, or host upgrades.
